front.title: The String Representation of LDAP Search Filters

abstract.t: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) [1] defines anetwork representation of a search filter transmitted to an LDAPserver. Some applications may find it useful to have a common way ofrepresenting these search filters in a human-readable form. Thisdocument defines a human-readable string format for representing thefull range of possible LDAP version 3 search filters, includingextended match filters.This document replaces RFC 2254. See Appendix A for a list ofchanges relative to RFC 2254.
